item.title: Can Geographic Data Save the World?
item.description: Contents Introductory comments An example: the propensity to cycle tool dplyr and tibbles (if time allows) Discussion: can GDS save the world? Introduction What is saving the world? Many ways of saying the same thing: ‘Policy-led research’ ‘Impact’ ‘Socially beneficial research’ Don’t be evil (Google) My definition: building an evidence-base for sustainable systems. In the context of climate change that means: Building an evidence-base to transition away from fossil fuels But could also be interpretted in terms of other (quantifiable) social/economic/environmental indicators Why bother?
